name: Start Here CMS
description: A simple CMS solution to guide users to acheive a goal

SECRET_KEY.description: A randomly generated secret to secure your Django installation

DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE.description: What version of settings to run

ADMIN_USER.description: The username of your admin account

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The password of your admin account

AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: The name of the AWS bucket you will use to store images and documents

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your secret access key to your AWS bucket

GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: Your Google Maps API key to use for the location selector (optional)

GOOGLE_WIDGET_DEFAULT_LAT.description: Default latitude to use for Google Maps location selector (optional - defaults to San Francisco)

GOOGLE_WIDGET_DEFAULT_LONG.description: Default longitude to use for Google Maps location selector (optional - defaults to San Francisco)

ALGOLIA_API_KEY.description: The secret API key used to manage your search box (optional)

ALGOLIA_APP_ID.description: The APP ID used to manage your search box (optional)

scripts.postdeploy: sh -c 'python manage.py migrate --noinput; python manage.py runscript create_admin; heroku pg:backups:restore https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/database-dump-starthere/c5de9726-b709-4fd9-af32-e03fe390df16 DATABASE_URL;'
